title: Aeron Ronnie Liaijak
aliases: Diplomat, Prince of Death, The Son of The Son of God,

content.text: Control extends to main body, server and the house (in the Riverbend Manor).
House: Many parts of the house have moving parts, electronics and possibly mechanical arms. All of these can be controlled by the system or work as is.
Server:  Stores all data from Main Body that need to be moved to preserve main storage. Has similar amount of storage as a typical human brain.
Main: Can store enough data needed in usual day to day, software running time is efficient and the actual time is faster than a human brain.
Highly durable, agile and aggressive
Can determine Critical Areas on whatever its observing
Can compute for the most efficient way to subdue, execute or evaluate target
Can decently fight against large number of enemies but is best against one main opponent
Will use any force or action deemed necessary by the level 0 commands
Equipped with high conversational understanding for diplomatic and social integration
Can detect social constructs and react accordingly but high usage of the diplomatic persona may be draining
Entire outer body looks and feels like a regular human body, but higher defense form does not.
Can be remotely controlled
(function removed or hardware required cannot be found)

Highly excitable situations will shut down default functions and will switch to a mechanical mode wherein the higher defense structure will switch out the human appearance. The mode cannot come out of state unless level 0 command has been fulfilled
Body parts can be disconnected at certain points and function as is, so long as it voluntarily performs the detachment. Forceful removal will result in damage.
Vulnerabilities:
Water will dissolve Redstone components and break the machinery, but it is waterproof unless protective outer layer is pierced

Temperament can be dependent on temperature. Keeping the machinery cold helps it run in top condition. It is able to work in extreme heat but may be irritable. The outer body may combust in high enough temperatures.
Maintenance: Joint Lubrication, Debris Clearing, Redstone Refill, Software and Hardware Check, Liquid Coolant Maintenance
